title.text: Changes in Age at Diagnosis of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in the
Changes in Age at Diagnosis of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in the

abstract.text: PURPOSE The prevalence of diabetes in the United States is increasing. There is also concern that diabetes may be occurring at a greater frequency in youth and in young adults. We describe US population trends in self-reported age at diagnosis of type 2 diabetes mellitus.
